name: Radiant Charjabug
author: Mizue
flavor_text: While its durable shell protects it from attacks, Charjabug strikes at enemies with jolts of electricity discharged from the tips of its jaws.

abilities.name: Shocking Block
abilities.effect: Whenever any player attaches an Energy card from their hand to 1 of their Pokémon V, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Linear Attack
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Radiant Pokémon in your deck.
